Posts.Content: My chemo ended last April. By July, I wasn't wearing the wig anymore. My hair was really short though. By September, I got my haircut. It looked like a real style by then. I now still have short hair because I keep geeting it trimmed but it is full & wavy. My hair was thin before. I guess I look at it as a bright side to chemo.
Posts.Title: how long until hair grows back
